title: The Koppenberg: 600 Meters of Misery that Divides the Tour of Flanders
content:
After last yearâ€™s mud-splattered carnage, some began asking if the Koppenberg was too much. At least this year the iconic climb will be tackled in dry conditions.

Read the full article at The Koppenberg: 600 Meters of Misery that Divides the Tour of Flanders on Velo.
author: ahood
